Detailed Description

Used for connecting to an embedded MySQL Database.

This class used the embedded library of MySQL to open and connect to databases.

bool DataBase::DataBaseOpen ( wxString  path  ) 

Function used to init the MySql embedded server and to open a database.

This function must be called before other Database functions.

Parameters:
path wxString containing the directory where live the database
Returns:
return true if library and connexion to the database ok
